forgeLabs.name: RFP Hunter Pro
forgeLabs.problem: Healthcare organizations miss critical RFPs because procurement portals are fragmented and alerts are generic
forgeLabs.solution: AI-powered RFP monitoring that scans 50+ procurement portals, extracts key details, scores fit against user criteria, and sends instant mobile/email alerts
forgeLabs.moat: Real-time multi-portal scanning + AI-powered fit scoring algorithm + healthcare domain expertise
forgeLabs.dataSource: Ontario Tenders, MERX, Biddingo, SAM.gov, hospital websites, plus 40+ municipal portals
forgeLabs.competitionCheck: Existing tools are generic (GovWin, BidNet) - none are healthcare-specific with AI scoring
forgeLabs.deployTo: iOS/Android app + Chrome extension + Teams app + web dashboard
forgeLabs.monetization: Freemium: $0 (5 alerts/mo), $49/mo (unlimited alerts + fit scoring), $199/mo (team dashboard + custom criteria)
forgeLabs.confidence: High - we already have scanning tech, clear pain point, B2B buyers will pay

articles.title: Establishing organizational AI governance in healthcare: a case study in Canada
articles.takeaway: Real-world implementation of PPTO framework in Canadian hospital system - validates practical approach to AI governance with stakeholder interviews and co-design workshops
articles.linkedinAngle: Case study from Canada validates practical AI governance frameworks in healthcare - methodology Sean uses with FORGE Health clients

articles.title: Advancing healthcare AI governance through a comprehensive maturity model based on systematic review
articles.takeaway: Brand new maturity model for healthcare AI governance - systematic review approach
articles.linkedinAngle: Fresh perspective on AI governance maturity - could inform LUMEN scoring methodology

articles.title: Ontario IPC releases new guidance on AI scribes
articles.takeaway: Ontario privacy commissioner provides specific guidance on AI scribes - direct regulatory relevance for Ontario hospitals
articles.linkedinAngle: Ontario hospitals now have clear IPC guidance on AI scribes - another example of regulatory intelligence that LUMEN could track

mindset.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
mindset.reflection: Every day FORGE Health doesn't exist in the market is a day competitors gain ground. But every day we DO execute - building LUMEN, connecting with CIOs, creating value - is a day we become more defensible. The regulatory intelligence moat grows stronger with each scan.
